Function reference

All functions

count_events() effective_rate() count_gl() rate_gl()
Calculate the rate of host-repertoire evolution
evolnets
evolnets: a package for summarizing inference of network evolution
extant_net
Extant network
get_sampled_networks()
Get posterior samples of networks of interactions of extant lineages at given time points in the past
get_summary_networks()
Get summary networks from posterior probabilities of interactions of extant lineages at given time points in the past
history
Data for Pieridae butterflies and their host plants from Braga et al. 2021
host_tree
Host plants tree
index_at_ages_samples()
Posterior distribution of network structure indices across ancestral networks
index_at_ages_summary()
Network structure indices across ancestral summary networks and extant network
match_modules()
Match modules of different ancestral networks across time.
modules_across_ages()
Evolution of modules: find and match modules across time slices
modules_from_samples()
Find modules in networks sampled across MCMC at specific time slices
modules_from_summary_networks()
Identify modules for each summary network at each age
mycomputeModules()
Modified version of bipartite's computeModules function
plot_ancestral_networks()
Plot ancestral networks with module information
plot_ancestral_states()
Plot ancestral states on the phylogeny.
plot_extant_matrix()
Plot a network with modules as an adjacency matrix
plot_index_at_ages()
Plot network structure indices across ancestral summary, sampled and extant networks
plot_matrix_phylo()
Plot a network with modules as an adjacency matrix, with aligned phylogenies.
plot_network_at_age()
Plot one ancestral network with module information at a given time
posterior_at_ages()
Calculate the posterior probability of ancestral host repertoires at time points in the past (ages)
posterior_at_nodes()
Calculate the posterior probability of ancestral host repertoires
read_history()
Read history.txt file produced by RevBayes
read_tree_from_revbayes()
Read symbiont tree file produced by RevBayes containing node indices
support_for_modules()
Calculate support for modules from summary networks based on modules of sampled networks
tree
Pieridae tree

Developed by Mariana P Braga, Wouter van der Bijl, Michael Landis.
